notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: All relevant TB data is reported in the supplementary material. The model software is publicly available from http://www.avenirhealth.org/. It can be downloaded and used freely in the same manner used in this publication. The authors did not have any special access privileges. The model projection files created as part of this study can be freely downloaded from LSHTM Data Compass ( https://doi.org/10.17037/DATA.00000950).
